text.tspan: Haptics is an increasingly vital aspect of many fields, and designing effective haptic interfaces has become a crucial challenge for researchers and practitioners alike,
due to the multidisciplinary nature and wide range of possibilities available. At Hapticology, we offer a general morphological method that can help you understand the
latest advancements and inspire your design creativity. Whether you're new to the field or a seasoned haptic interface designer, we invite you to explore the cutting-
edge of haptic interfaces with Hapticology. Join us in exploring new possibilities in haptic interaction!
